definitions.text: an object or statement produced before a court of law and referred to while giving evidence

examples: the museum had many exhibits of oriental art

definitions.text: show an attribute, property, knowledge, or skill
to show, make visible or apparent
examples: The Metropolitan Museum is exhibiting Goya's works this month
Why don't you show your nice legs and wear shorter skirts?
National leaders will have to display the highest skills of statesmanship

definitions.text: give an exhibition of to an interested audience
examples: We will demo the new software in Washington
She parades her new husband around town
